name: CPS_1_6_3_Related_by_Living_Situation
title: CPS.1.6.3 Related by Living Situation (Function)
description: Provide information on relationships by living situation. Examples of living situations include college dormitory, military deployment, in same household.
purpose: Living situations may be important means for providers to uniquely identify patients or to identify illnesses that may occur within a given proximity. Patient relationships that may be affected by past situations may include the environment of the patient when the patient was a fetus, for example, a mother who worked in a chemical factory last week or while pregnant with the patient thirty years prior, or mother carried child during time of extreme famine.

statement.label: CPS.1.6.3#01
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to render living situation related information.
